description: A magical winter night adventure with a guiding star.
name: winter_wish

pages.image_prompt: storybook illustration, cozy night scene, warm indoor lighting, {name} sitting beside a snowy window, gazing out at the night sky full of stars, gentle snow falling outside, soft painterly texture, emotional winter atmosphere
pages.negative_prompt: blurry, distorted face, deformed hands, low quality, overexposed, multiple people, extra limbs, watermark, text
pages.positive_prompt: masterpiece, best quality, storybook style, animation, 3-year-old child wearing a red winter coat with white fur collar, blue mittens, brown snow boots, and yellow knitted hat, sitting on a bench and looking at the sky, gazing out at the night sky full of big stars
pages.story_text: {name}, a {age}-year-old child, sat on a bench watching snowflakes fall softly outside. {they} dreamed of meeting a real star one day.

pages.image_prompt: magical winter night, snowy yard, {name} running toward a glowing star lying on the snow, soft shadows, warm golden light reflecting on snow, starry sky background, emotional painterly tone
pages.negative_prompt: floating star, missing ground, overbright sky, low contrast, multiple stars on snow, duplicate figures, bad lighting, blurry
pages.positive_prompt: masterpiece, best quality, full body, cinematic winter night scene, {age}-year-old child wearing a red winter coat with white fur collar, blue mittens, brown snow boots, and yellow knitted hat, running toward looking at a small glowing object shaped like a star on snow, emits warm golden light onto the ground, soft painterly lighting, starry sky above
pages.story_text: One night, {name} saw a bright streak of light cross the sky. A tiny glowing star landed gently on the snow outside.

pages.image_prompt: storybook winter scene, close-up of {name} kneeling in snow, holding a glowing star in cupped hands, golden light illuminating {their} face, snow falling gently, soft painterly glow, emotional focus on warmth and wonder
pages.negative_prompt: floating star, distorted hands, low detail, blurry lighting, too dark, wrong object shape, deformed face
pages.positive_prompt: masterpiece, best quality, cinematic lighting, soft watercolor storybook style, {age}-year-old child wearing a red winter coat with white fur collar, blue mittens, brown snow boots, and yellow knitted hat, kneeling in snow holding a small glowing star-shaped object in both hands, warm light reflecting on {their} face, snowflakes falling, emotional expression of awe and happiness, consistent face and outfit
pages.story_text: {name} knelt in the snow and picked up the tiny star. Its light glowed warmly in {their} hands, and for the first time, {they} felt a magical warmth inside.

pages.image_prompt: peaceful morning winter scene, {name} standing in snow looking up at the sky, a single bright star glowing above, warm sunrise colors, snow-covered village in background, emotional closure, soft painterly tone
pages.negative_prompt: multiple stars, distorted sky, inconsistent lighting, overexposed snow, extra characters, deformed face
pages.positive_prompt: masterpiece, best quality, cinematic morning light, a {age}-year-old {gender} wearing a red winter coat with white fur collar, blue mittens, brown snow boots, and yellow knitted hat, standing in snow looking up at the sky, a single bright star glowing high above, snow-covered village in the distance,storybook painterly illustration, gentle light bloom, magical and peaceful feelinge
pages.story_text: As dawn came, the star floated back to the sky. {name} waved goodbye, smiling as one star in the morning light shone brighter than all the rest.
